name: EmployeeExperience
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Employee Experience is the employee’s observations and perceptions about his or her employment at a particular company. Employee experience encapsulates what people encounter, observe or feel over the course of their employee journey at an organization.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
